hooks.command: input=$(cat); file_path=$(echo "$input" | grep -o '"file_path"[[:space:]]*:[[:space:]]*"[^"]*"' | sed 's/.*"\([^"]*\)".*/\1/' || echo "$input" | grep -o '"path"[[:space:]]*:[[:space:]]*"[^"]*"' | sed 's/.*"\([^"]*\)".*/\1/'); if [[ "$file_path" == *.env* ]] || [[ "$file_path" == *credentials* ]]; then echo 'You cannot read the .env file' >&2; exit 2; fi

case "$CLAUDE_TOOL_FILE_PATH" in */etc/*|*/usr/bin/*|*/usr/sbin/*|*.production.*|*prod*config*|*/node_modules/*|*/vendor/*) echo "Error: File $CLAUDE_TOOL_FILE_PATH is protected from modification" >&2; exit 1 ;; esac
